content.p: Welcome to our department Follow us on LinkedIn This is the place making the sustainable obtainable. We develop chemical and environmental engineers who help make a greener planet spin a little smoother – transforming food, energy, chemicals and waste to minimise impacts on our air, land and water. Here you get the space, support, skills and connections to revel in the real world. Make products, processes and systems that engineer things in a smarter, safer and cleaner way. From career-advancing courses to our leading research, chemical and environmental engineers protect the world's natural resources and improve people's lives. Get ready to shape the real world. Explore Chemical and Environmental Engineering facilities Learn about pioneering research for a sustainable future Where are Chemical and Environmental Engineering graduates now? Find out about our academic staff, their expertise and research "I have learnt on this course that you cannot work alone as an engineer. The sense of community is very comforting and makes the course even more pleasurable." — Annette Amoa, Chemical Engineering BEng student for Chemical Engineering in The Guardian University Guide 2024
